archimate:Goal.name: ISO/IEC 27002:2013
archimate:Goal.documentation:
This version provides best practice recommendations on information security management for those who are responsible for initiating, implementing, or maintaining information security management systems (ISMS). It lays out a set of controls that organizations can consider in their security practices, covering areas like cryptography, operations security, and communications security among others.
Information Security Management System is a systematic approach to managing sensitive information to ensure it remains secure, including people, processes, and IT systems.
